author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Modify HcalZDCDetId to add 2 functions to convert station # and phi index to channel ID and vice versa

#### PR validation:

Use the runTheMatrix test workflows

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-gex199 Modify HcalZDCDetId to add 2 functions to convert station # and phi index to channel ID and viceversa
